result.eng: The work will be easier after a while.
result.ga: Beidh an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaill
result.orig: Beidh an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaill
result.html: Beidh an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaillThe work will be easier after a while.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaillThe work will be easier after a while.

result.eng: There is no easy cure for cancer.
result.ga: Níl aon leigheas éasca ar an ailse
result.orig: Níl aon leigheas éasca ar an ailse
result.html: Níl aon leigheas éasca ar an ailseThere is no easy cure for cancer.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon leiġeas éasca ar an ailseThere is no easy cure for cancer.

result.eng: They overcame the other team easily.
result.ga: Sháraigh siad an fhoireann eile go héasca
result.orig: Sháraigh siad an fhoireann eile go héasca
result.html: Sháraigh siad an fhoireann eile go héascaThey overcame the other team easily.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ siad an ḟoireann eile go héascaThey overcame the other team easily.

result.eng: It seems that it will be easy.
result.ga: Tá an chuma ar an scéal go mbeidh sé éasca
result.orig: Tá an chuma ar an scéal go mbeidh sé éasca
result.html: Tá an chuma ar an scéal go mbeidh sé éascaIt seems that it will be easy.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ċuma ar an scéal go mbeiḋ sé éascaIt seems that it will be easy.

result.html: Tá an Ghaeilge éascaIrish is easy.
result.ponchtml: Tá an Ġaeilge éascaIrish is easy.

result.html: Tá sé éascaIt's easy.

result.html: Tá sé éasca go leorIt's easy enough.

result.eng: Cavan had an easy victory over the Antrim team.
result.ga: Bhí bua éasca ag an gCabhán ar fhoireann Aontroma
result.orig: Bhí bua éasca ag an gCabhán ar fhoireann Aontroma
